traits.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If Jarazoun dies, its body disintegrates in a flash of fire and puff of smoke, leaving behind only equipment Jarazoun was wearing or carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The efreeti makes two scimitar attacks or uses its Hurl Flame twice.

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6 damage) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
entries: Ranged Spell atk +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 17 (5d6 damage) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The efreeti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
